### [pammtools](https://adibender.github.io/pammtools/)

R package for fitting and analyzing piece-wise exponential additive mixed models (PAMMs) for survival analysis. Flexible modeling of time-varying effects, cumulative effects, and competing risks.

[Documentation](https://adibender.github.io/pammtools/) | [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=pammtools) | [GitHub](https://github.com/adibender/pammtools)
:::

::: {.project-card}
[![](images/projects/mlr3proba.png){.project-img}](https://mlr3proba.mlr-org.com/)

### [mlr3proba](https://mlr3proba.mlr-org.com/)

R package extending the mlr3 ecosystem for probabilistic predictions and survival analysis. Unified interface for survival learners, measures, and prediction types.

[Documentation](https://mlr3proba.mlr-org.com/) | [GitHub](https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3proba)
:::

::: {.project-card}
[![](images/projects/mai.png){.project-img}](https://menstrualbloodai.my.canva.site/mai)

### [Menstrual Blood AI](https://menstrualbloodai.my.canva.site/mai)

Exploring menstrual blood as a non-invasive diagnostic tool using AI. Targeting early detection of endometriosis, diabetes, and cancer biomarkers from an underutilized biological resource.

[Project page](https://menstrualbloodai.my.canva.site/mai)
:::

::: {.project-card}
[![](images/projects/mlsa.png){.project-img}](https://www.mlsabook.com)

### [Machine Learning in Survival Analysis](https://www.mlsabook.com)

Online textbook co-authored with Raphael Sonabend covering machine learning methods for survival analysis. Includes theory, worked examples in R, and practical guidance for practitioners.

[Read online](https://www.mlsabook.com)
:::

::: {.project-card}
[![](images/projects/coalitions.png){.project-img}](https://adibender.github.io/coalitions/)

### [coalitions](https://adibender.github.io/coalitions/)

R package for Bayesian estimation of coalition probabilities in multi-party democracies. Combines survey data with MCMC sampling to estimate seat distributions and coalition scenarios.

[Documentation](https://adibender.github.io/coalitions/) | [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=coalitions) | [GitHub](https://github.com/adibender/coalitions)
:::
